snippet: After a man was swallowed by a sinkhole in Tampa, Fla., there seemed to be new ones opening up all over the place, but experts say that’s just what sinkholes do.
abstract: Word spreads of other sinkholes opening up since bizarre death of man who was swallowed by one in Tampa, Fla, in Tampa as well as in some Pennsylvania towns, Illinois and Louisiana; experts counsel not to panic, saying sinkholes have opened up on daily basis since anyone can remember.
lead_paragraph: After a man was swallowed by a sinkhole in Tampa, Fla., there seemed to be new ones opening up all over the place, but experts say that’s just what sinkholes do.

headline.seo: After Sinkhole Death, Experts Say Frenzy Is Unwarranted
headline.main: One Sinkhole Killed, and Many Others Opened, but Experts Counsel Not to Panic
headline.print_headline: One Sinkhole Killed, and Many Others Opened, but Experts Counsel Not to Panic
